price: Those are the towns We destroyed when they persisted in wrongdoing, and We set an appointed time for their destruction.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡ لَمَّا ظَلَمُواْ وَجَعَلۡنَا لِمَهۡلِكِهِم مَّوۡعِدٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
